thread.title: James Corden's Star-Studded Carpool Karaoke at the Grammys Might Be the Best Yet
thread.title_full: James Corden's Star-Studded Carpool Karaoke at the Grammys Might Be the Best Yet

author: Terry Carter
title: James Corden's Star-Studded Carpool Karaoke at the Grammys Might Be the Best Yet
text:
James Corden Carpool Karaoke at the 2017 Grammys James Corden's Star-Studded Carpool Karaoke at the Grammys Might Be the Best Yet February 12, 2017 
— Mashable (@mashable) February 13, 2017 
James Corden stuck to what he does best at the 2017 Grammys when he invited Neil Diamond, Jennifer Lopez, Keith Urban, John Legend, Faith Hill, Tim McGraw, and Jason Derulo to join him for an epic session of Carpool Karaoke. The star-studded group sang along to "Sweet Caroline" by Neil Diamond and was later joined by Beyoncé's 5-year-old daughter, Blue Ivy, who decided she wanted to be apart of the fun. Watch the sweet jam-out session above.
